name: Cubic Logics
description:
Cubic Logics, ISO 9001 - 2008 company, Microsoft Gold Partner and awarded as Most promising Microsoft Solution Provider by CIO Review Magazine in 2015
 
Cubic leads and serves the industry for SharePoint consultancy, development, applications Office 365 deployment, and migration, messaging, collaboration, virtualization, hosted application services, managed Infrastructure services & provide consulting for innovative ways to enhance productivity & reduce costs.
